proposal: Hello Soma Network community, congrats on reaching 479 holders! It's clear you're building a robust platform with SMA, XSMA, and WSMA tokens. Your dedication to faster transactions, secure blockchain, and versatile dApps is commendable. Our B2B tools might just be the cherry on top of your ecosystem. From DEX creation to Lottery and Wallet services, they're community-driven, just like your Soma Dex and Soma Wallet. And remember, with our tools, you're not playing, you're creating. See my profile for demo and details.
